lead_paragraph: The vote Thursday to determine the host for the 2022 tournament will be far more interesting than deciding what country gets to host the 2018 World Cup.
snippet: The vote Thursday to determine the host for the 2022 tournament will be far more interesting than deciding what country gets to host the 2018 World Cup.

headline.main: 2022 World Cup Decision: Play It Safe, or Risky?
headline.seo: 2022 World Cup Decision: Play It Safe, or Risky?
